ProductInfo.Features:
Canon EOS Rebel T3 (1100D) SLR Digital Camera w/ 18-55mm IS II Lens Brand New USA w/Manufacturer's Supplied Accessories
Canon EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Telephoto Zoom Lens Brand New USA w/Manufacturer's Supplied Accessories
16GB SDHC Class 10 Secure Digital Memory Card + Multi 50 in 1 USB Card Reader
Rechargeable LPE10 Lithium Ion Replacement Battery + External Travel Quick Charger w/Car Cord
Mini HDMI to HDMI 6 Foot Cable + Full Size 59" Tripod W/Carry Bag
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel T3 12.2 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera with EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS II Zoom Lens & EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Telephoto Zoom Lens + LPE10 Battery & Charger + 16GB Deluxe HDMI 11 Lens Accessory Kit
